info.title: IMMZD18SPneumococcal3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table Schema API
info.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD18SPneumococcal3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.

get.summary: JSON Schema definition for the enumeration ValueSet-IMMZD18SPneumococcal3DosesVS
get.description: This endpoint serves the JSON Schema definition for the enumeration ValueSet-IMMZD18SPneumococcal3DosesVS.

ValueSet-IMMZD18SPneumococcal3DosesVS.title: IMMZD18SPneumococcal3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
ValueSet-IMMZD18SPneumococcal3DosesVS.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD18SPneumococcal3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#First pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered-121

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#First pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered to client, who is less than or equal to 5 years of age, within 24 months post birth-280
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Second pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered-121

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#First pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered to client, who is less than or equal to 5 years of age. Pneumococcal dose was not administered within 24 months post birth. Client is at high risk for pneumococcal infection.-333

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Second pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered to client, who is less than or equal to 5 years of age. First pneumococcal dose was administered within 12 months post birth.-302
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Third pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed.-98

http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Third pneumococcal dose from the primary series was administered to client, who is more than 12 months of age. The latest pneumococcal dose was administered within 12 months post birth. Client is either HIV positive or had preterm birth.-351
ValueSet-IMMZD18SPneumococcal3DosesVS.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD18SPneumococcal3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD18SPneumococcal3DosesVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
